des: "I got this recipe from my Italian Grampa, who used to make it for me at Christmas time.  Perfect for a choco-holic like me.  A guaranteed winner! Serve in any glass and garnish with whipped cream and sprinkle on chocolate powder.  "
ins: In blender, combine brandy, creme de cacao, and chocolate syrup. Blend at medium speed until well-mixed.  Add the softened ice cream in large chunks. Blend at high speed until smooth. Serve immediately.
